amendment.description: Amendment, offered as a substitute for the LaTourette amendment (A001), sought to delete language concerning labor-management agreements, and add language which states that nothing in this Act shall affect the level of protection provided to employees of freight systems or of transit systems.
amendment.purpose: An amendment, offered as a substitute for the LaTourette amendment, to specify that the labor reform provisions in the bill apply only to Amtrak and not to other freight and transit employees.

action.text: Substitute (A002) offered by Mr. Quinn to the LaTourette amendment (A001).

vote.text: On agreeing to the Quinn amendment (A002) Failed by recorded vote: 195 - 223 (Roll no. 529).
